QuestData.Title: An Ancient Reborn
QuestData.Description: I'm convinced that YOU are the herald of Aviana, $n. It was you who first saw her and rescued her essence from the claws of a dragon.$B$BYes, I believe Aviana is to be reborn into our world. And you shall have the honor of ushering her over the threshold.$B$BTake this incense and burn it before Aviana's egg in the room just above me.$B$BThe ancient awaits, $n. Our deliverance is here!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Herald's Incense before Aviana's Egg at the Shrine of Aviana.
QuestData.RewardText: I ... live.$B$BThose that tried to corrupt me and kidnap my children will soon feel the rake of my talons, $c. Believe it.$B$BContinue to push forward across Hyjal. I will collect myself and assemble with the other ancients.
